Sorry @AlexeyAkhunov , but then i can not reproduce the error anymore. I am using `v2.36.1` now and no issues so far.

erigon --version

But seems that restarting multiple times helps.

I re-runed the entire sync process with version `v2.36.1` and the only difference was the prune without "c": `--prune=hrt`
No issues this time, should i close the issue?
